name: Chicpins
description: Camera-pin set in tortoiseshell, with a satin bow, gilded croissant, and a leopard motif, stitches vacation vibes across jackets and hats, turning every tote into a little story for spontaneous day trips. Cluster them on blazers for gallery nights or dot denim jackets at weekend markets, finishing looks with flair.

name: Lifeisasport
description: Heritage houndstooth meets sporty ease in this wool cap, featuring a leather-look mantra patch proclaiming life is sport and play all day, bringing instant pep to coffee runs and campus sprints alike. Top off trench coats and wide-leg denim for chilly commutes or frame bike-short sets during weekend walks, sealing off-duty looks with retro-cool confidence.

name: Careslin
description: Threader chains with teardrop zirconia and pearl charms shimmer along the ear, offering layering power and subtle sway as they catch light from every angle. Layer them with a slip dress for rooftop celebrations, or stack one strand with a turtleneck in study sessions for whisper-light sparkle.

name: Ridges
description: Midnight pavé blankets sculptural domes with rhinestones that catch light like city windows at dusk, turning the cocktail rings into conversation magnets for evenings that glow. Layer them with a slip for a look, or stack the bands beside a knit for coffee catchups.

name: Pilatesclub
description: Mismatched cotton crew socks wink with bold slogans—“SPORTYISH” meets “PILATES GAL”—and a polka-dot grip sole that keeps every stride steady from studio sprints to campus errands. Layer them with leggings for gym or coffee runs, or let them peek above sneakers to finish the look.

name: Nightfaller
description: Cascading snake-chain fringe fans out from bead-clustered studs, catching light and delivering shoulder-skimming drama that makes these earrings conversation starters. Pair them with a sleek slip dress at rooftop cocktails or elevate vintage tees and leather pants on concert nights.

name: Astrobear
description: Bring a spark of joy to your everyday with Astrobear, a cute white bear bag charm accented by a bold black star. This playful accessory adds a fun and whimsical touch to your bags, making your style truly out of this world. Perfect for those who love a little charm in their daily routine!

name: Maplevale
description: Open-work hoops shimmer with hematite beads, a polished gold curve weaving texture into a sparkle that catches light at every turn, all day, every day. Frame them with a tee and jeans for strolls, or top a jumpsuit for nights out.

name: Myrage
description: A coiled metal square cradles wine-red cabochons, elevating clip-ons with an edge that catches light from coffee runs to city nights. Pair them with a slip dress for sunset shine, or frame a blazer-and-jeans brunch look with a touch of vintage glam.

name: Snakesa
description: Coiled serpent metalwork curves around the wrists, with golden scales tipped by jet crystals that radiate bold flair within one snap, a statement that pairs with dresses and with denim. Stack them with a dress for parties, or frame a sundress with a blazer for date nights.

name: Snakes
description: Gold serpents coil along the band, their inky crystals catching every flash as shoulder-skimming drops flicker under lights and turn a moment into a heartbeat. Layer it with a slip dress for rooftop cocktails, or cinch a leather tee and jeans for gigs, letting the shimmer finish the look.

name: Surferboy
description: This Stranger Things x ALDO keychain features the totally tubular Surfer Boy Pizza van and delivers the most iconic hanging charms: a mixtape, waffle, rubber chicken, playful bungee cords, and the iconic “Friends Don't Lie” quote.

name: Florabella
description: Hammered gold blooms catch flickers of light, anchoring oval loops of midnight glass beads into a sculptural pair that feels like garden romance in motion. Frame silk slips for a wedding moment or elevate a vintage tee with leather pants for late night gigs, letting the blooms frame the face with easy, confident glow.

name: Tinsla
description: Faceted black beads form delicate bows that catch candlelight like tiny disco balls, while featherweight posts keep these statement earrings comfy through every toast and dance. Frame a silk slip dress at rooftop soirees or top with a leather jacket and sleek updo at late-night gigs for moody sparkle.

name: Cutiebow
description: Lettuce-edge cuffs flirt around ankles, a slim satin bow catching the eye against monochrome cotton crews, delivering a playful everyday polish. Layer them with a breezy midi for date nights or cinch denim with a cropped tee for campus coffee runs, letting the bows and shine finish the look.

name: Myrage
description: Ribbed gold squares cradle black cabochons like mirrors, and clip-on backs deliver bold polish without piercing, turning everyday moments into a quiet, confident shimmer. Pair them with silk blouses and trousers by day, or let loose waves frame your jumpsuits after dark, so the look shifts from desk-to-date with one easy twist.

name: Ovalsparkles
description: Glittering oval-cut zirconia centers crown these full eternity bands in a versatile two-piece set, catching city lights with every turn and inviting a closer look. Layer them with a blazer for cocktails or stack beside denim and a satin slip for city nights and effortless weekday polish.

name: Stonebrooke
description: Gunmetal crystals cloak circles that dangle from studs, turning these earrings into glittering halos that shine in low light. Wear with a slip dress at rooftop gatherings, or pair with ear cuffs and a blazer for gallery nights, and let the glow finish every moment.

name: Buttons
description: Textured gold-tone studs in a set with hearts, squares and ovals invite you to swap and stack to match every mood for endless mix-and-match moments. Layer the hearts with a blazer for cocktails, or stack the squares under a chunky knit at coffee catchups.

name: Bowly
description: Miniature velvet-look bows scatter across these semi-sheer tights, turning a wardrobe staple into charm that lasts all night. Layer them under a slip dress and ankle boots for rooftop drinks, or pair with loafers and denim shorts at casual brunch.

name: Tinsla
description: Hand-strung beads twist into oversized bows that shimmer like confetti, giving these lightweight studs playful swagger that catches attention before you even say hello. Frame them with a slip dress at birthday dinners or stack with denim and leather jackets on concert nights for instant party polish.

name: Roundsparkles
description: Mirror-bright solitaire crowns a slender band, catching light with a radiant glow that hints at refined polish and easy charm for day-to-night moments everywhere in every look. Stack both with a slip dress at rooftop weddings, or wear the solitaire solo alongside denim and a crisp white tee for understated shine.

name: Cozycloud
description: Cloud-soft brushed wool paired with lofty ribbed stitches turns this cuffed beanie into instant coziness without disrupting minimalist style. Top it over your puffer coat during snow-day commutes or frame weekend joggers and an oversized tee at fireside cabin hangs for softness that's polished too.

name: Frilluxe
description: Brighten your sock drawer with the Frilluxe 2-pack ruffle socks, featuring one sleek black pair and one crisp white pair. Each sock boasts adorable ruffled edges for a playful, feminine touch that elevates any outfit. Perfect for mixing and matching while keeping your style fun and fresh every day.

name: Cozycloud
description: Plush teddy-fleece loops give this rib-knit beanie cloud-soft comfort while the deep cuff adds snug structure that keeps warmth locked in from sidewalk coffees to snowy hikes. Top it off with your tailored wool coat for city commutes or finish your puffer-and-leggings combo on weekend errands to seal cozy vibes.

name: Sheerie
description: Two-tone tights glide on as a duo of silky sheer fabric in wine and noir, offering stretch from morning to night. Layer this pair under a slip dress for rooftop dates or cinch a blazer-shorts set for desk-to-dance flair, to carry you from coffee runs to after-hours.

name: Sheerly
description: Silky matte tights wrap legs in deep blackout coverage, their stretchy polyester knit moving like second skin for confident strides from morning commutes to midnight cab rides. Layer under a plaid mini and loafers for campus lectures, or frame leather shorts with ankle boots for gig nights.

name: Yeikin
description: Champagne-tinted baguette stones pave micro crystals across playful open rings, turning a five-piece stack into a statement that catches the light with every gesture and pairs effortlessly with day-to-night outfits. Layer the drops with a blazer for cocktails, or stack them with a knit at coffee runs to finish looks with subtle drama.

name: Wildchic
description: Leopard-print calf-hair studs pair with ovals and polished huggie hoops in a three-pair set that adds texture and a subtle gleam to city-ready looks. Swap or stack them to dress satin slips for dinners or finish bomber jackets with jeans during laid-back errands.

name: Frillie
description: Scalloped frill crowns these over-the-knee rib-knit wool socks, wrapping legs in cozy stretch that feels like your favorite sweater, only warmer for boot-season wanderings. Layer them under lug-sole ankle boots for coffee runs, or let the fluttery edge peek above riding boots on crisp campus walks.

name: Cozycove
description: Step into ultimate comfort with Cozycove slippers. Wrapped in plush sherpa, they keep your feet warm and snug all day. The playful bow and secure strap add a touch of charm and ensure they stay perfectly in place, making relaxation feel even cozier. Perfect for lounging or quick errands, these slippers bring a cozy twist to your home routine.

name: Cheetahluxe
description: Glossy gold bangles etched with striding cheetahs deliver instant stack appeal and a whisper of untamed confidence that catch light with every move on wrists everywhere. Layer them over satin slips at twilight parties or stack beside your watch during campus days for quiet flair.

name: Cozycove
description: Step into ultimate comfort with Cozycove slippers. Wrapped in plush sherpa, they keep your feet warm and snug all day. The playful bow and secure strap add a touch of charm and ensure they stay perfectly in place, making relaxation feel even cozier. Perfect for lounging or quick errands, these slippers bring a cozy twist to your home routine.

name: Tinnie
description: A velvety bag charm swings from a gold ring, its bow trailing like streamers to bring cheer to any key or tote handle. Clip it to a structured satchel for campus dashes, or let it dangle from your wristlet at holiday mixers for instant whimsy.

name: Bamey
description: Velvety deep-red petals unfurl around a sparkle of faceted beads, turning the twin studs into miniature corsages that catch candlelight and instantly lift even the simplest look. Pin them on for wedding-guest brunches with a satin midi, or stack beside tiny hoops at rooftop concerts for moody drama.

name: Glimery
description: Fine vertical ribbing runs from cuff to toe on these cotton crew socks delivering cushy comfort in earthy neutrals that slip effortlessly between sneakers loafers and lounging. Layer under chunky boots for campus mornings or flash above sport sandals on post-hike coffee runs finishing outfits easily.

name: Serpenta
description: Snake studs flicker with pave crystals along gilded curves, emerald-tipped eyes, and a silhouette that brings mythic edge to every head turn. Frame a ponytail beside a jacket for nights out, stack hoops with a slip for drinks and tunes.

name: Cityofhawkinss
description: This denim shoulder bag is packed with Stranger Things lore. Custom charms and contrasting red stitching weave a layered story. And the inner lining holds a mystery of its own—a black-and-white collage of iconic Hawkins landmarks. Eleven out of ten!

name: Bowclutchh
description: Micro rhinestones crown a silk bow clutch, turning a practical evening essential with space for cards and lipstick into a twinkling focal point you reach for from gala arrivals to late-night cab rides. Top it with a tailored blazer for city-night looks or keep it simple with a white tee and jeans for day-to-night ease.

name: Friendsdontlie
description: This Stranger Things x ALDO top-handle handbag features the iconic “Friends Don't Lie” quote subtly embossed on its tone-on-tone exterior. Inside, the lining reveals a rad surprise, a graphic collage of all the iconic Hawkins hangouts where all friends are welcome.

name: Woofy
description: Bring a touch of whimsy to your outfit with the Woofy purse. Crafted with cozy sherpa material, this dog-shaped bag is full of playful charm and youthful energy. Perfect for carrying your essentials while adding a fun, cuddly vibe to your look. Ideal for those who love unique accessories that make a statement.

name: Dressboww
description: Allover pave studs transform metal bows into pocket-sized spotlights, catching every dance-floor beam and turning simple looks into after-dark moments, perched atop a sleek ponytail for evenings that demand glow. Layer them with a blazer for cocktails, or frame them with a chunky knit at coffee catchups.

name: Decadencee
description: Plush satin bow shines on this structured mini top-handle, its deep burgundy wrapping like a gift and concealing an interior perfect for your phone, cards, and lip touch-up. Pair it with a slip dress for holiday parties or tuck against tailored suiting on date nights to complete the look.

name: Kelhanifurr
description: Burgundy faux fur meets gleaming ring handles in a mini bag that switches from arm candy to hands-free in seconds, thanks to a braided chain strap that feels equally ready for party time and casual days. Carry it with velvet for holiday parties or sling over denim on coffee runs to finish the look with effortless polish.

name: Nalaynaa
description: Braided leather handle crowns this sleek black bucket bag, its clean lines paired with a detachable curb-chain strap for effortless hands-free moments during commutes and cafe stops alike all season long. Carry it with a tailored trench for commutes, or sling it over satin slips for rooftop drinks.

name: Nalaynaa
description: Supple brown leathers frame velvety suede centers, crowned by chunky braided handles, while detachable golden chains flip this hobo from arm candy to easy-shoulder carry in a heartbeat, wherever life calls. Pair it with knits for coffee runs or with midi coats for evening errands, and carry the look with effortless polish.

name: Decadencee
description: Silky chocolate-brown satin combines with an oversized knotted bow, turning this petite top-handle into a pocket-sized gift that opens with a hidden magnetic snap, keeping essentials secure all night. Carry it with a slinky slip dress for cocktails or tuck it under a tailored blazer at brunch meetings to enhance the vibe.

name: Alosaa
description: Liquid-shine patent catches city lights on this structured satchel in deep cabernet, framed by gold buckles and a dangling padlock charm that signals secure, upscale flair for days that demand polish. Carry it to client pitches with tailored trousers or sling it over a satin slip for after-hours socials.

name: Mallasvee
description: Mirror-bright red patent turns this clutch into pure moment magic, while a practical wristlet strap lets you switch from handheld elegance to easy, hands-free moments as the night unfolds. Pair it with satin slips for parties or carry it with jeans on spontaneous outings to finish every look with instant polish.

name: Opulencee
description: A drama-sized satin-finish bow crowns the scarlet leather silhouette, petite top handles looping through gleaming eyelets so essentials slip inside an open interior like unwrapping gifts. Carry it with a slip dress for dinner dates or tuck beside a sharp blazer at afternoon weddings, tying the outfit together.

name: Miyabell
description: Leopard-print luxe sits on a clean, two-tone silhouette, catching the light as you move from day to night. The gold-tone chain strap can be removed for a sleeker moment. Carry it with a little black dress for a party, or sling it over jeans and a tee for playful weekend strolls.

name: Julietta
description: Croc-embossed leather shapes sculptural triangles, centering on sleek golden bars that snap shut with hidden magnets—a quiet, architectural statement you carry with confidence and a touch of everyday glamour for city days and carefree nights. Carry it with a tailored blazer and jeans for office-to-dinner polish, or sling it over a flowing dress for weekend city strolls.

name: Daboucaa
description: Glossy croc-embossed leather in soft latte tones gives this sleek rectangle a touch of quiet luxury, and the detachable chunky chain transforms into a slim shoulder strap effortlessly. Carry it with a tailored blazer for morning meetings, or sling it over a slip dress at rooftop drinks to complete the look.

name: Clubglowwx
description: Blush-pink luggage tag and gleaming pyramid charm add playful color to this structured pebble-grain tote, whose vertical stitched panels and gold hardware frame an interior built for all-day living. Carry it with a tailored blazer for presentations or tuck beside airy dresses on weekend coffee runs to complete the look.

name: Miyabell
description: Saffiano leather meets a snake-print panel in this polished crossbody, glinting with gold-tone hardware and a tassel accent that catches the eye as a detachable chain strap offers convertible carry. Sling it with a sundress for sunset drinks, or carry it with denim and blazer for chic daytime looks that finish outfits with polish.

name: Arrow
description: Burgundy suede meets free-spirited fringe that drapes to the floor, turning this spacious tote into a statement piece, while a hidden magnetic snap and gold bee charm keep essentials considered. Carry it with wide-leg denim on coffee runs or sling it alongside a knit midi dress for crisp fall evenings, sealing the look.

name: Smallharperr
description: Polished silver studs illuminate the softly structured hobo silhouette, turning supple leather into wearable disco vibes while an easy magnetic snap secures phone, gloss, and more inside. Carry it with a satin cami and jeans on coffee dates or tuck it underarm at after-hour gigs to complete the vibe.

name: Sloaniee
description: Richly grained black leather meets caramel trims on this bucket, and a snap-on wide guitar strap swaps in for the sleek top handle, giving you instant studio-to-street versatility without missing a beat. Carry it with tailored trousers for commuter confidence, or sling it over weekend knits to pull everything together effortlessly.

name: Jeynnaa
description: Structured in tan leather, this top-handle bag gains a playful safari-chic twist from a removable leopard-print pouch that clips on with gold hardware, instantly elevating everyday city moments. Carry it to brunch with a sundress, or sling it over denim and a blazer for versatile weekend wear.

name: Alarissaa
description: Glossy wine-tone patent leather combines croc, lizard, and smooth panels into a sleek patchwork finished with a minimalist gold bar clasp, creating a clutch that catches gallery lights and camera flashes. Clutch it against a satin slip for rooftop cocktails or tuck it under a tailored jumpsuit at wedding receptions to complete any look.

name: Lilithaa
description: Forest-green croc-embossed leather wraps a chain-frame across this crossbody, turning it into a luxe jewel you can carry from coffee runs to after-dark gigs, with a glow that follows you through the day. Carry it with a satin slip for cocktails or sling it over a graphic tee and leather pants for city gigs.

name: Sloaniee
description: Soft pebble-grain leather meets tan trims in a crisp trapeze shape, but the real trick is the clip-off, wide webbing strap that flips this satchel from polished top-handle to laid-back crossbody in seconds. Carry it with tailored trousers for coffee meetings, or sling it over joggers on weekend errands to pull everything together.

name: Brimortonblngg
description: Midnight glass beads cloak the envelope silhouette in a quiet sparkle, while tonal hardware and turn-locks catch the light as you move, giving this bag a sleek, city-ready glow perfect for after-dark moments. Carry it with a blazer for poised office-to-evening transitions, or sling it over denim for casual city strolls, finishing outfits with subtle, confident polish.

name: Rouxx
description: Ultra-slim lizard-skin silhouette exudes after-dark poise, with a chain-tipped turn-lock that adds subtle drama and keeps essentials secure from first toast to the final taxi ride through crowded nights and quiet mornings alike. Carry it by the petite handle with a satin slip for rooftop soirées, or tuck it under your arm with denim for gallery nights.

name: Jeynnaa
description: Snakeskin-printed pouch dangles from this beige satchel, detaching with a quick clip so the main bag stays polished while the pouch goes solo, adding a playful, texture-rich twist to everyday moments. Carry it to meetings with tailored separates or sling it over weekend denim for effortless, city-ready finishes.

name: Maelax
description: Geometric chocolate-brown and black pattern gives this roomy tote city-polish, anchored by gleaming gold-tone hardware and a lock-and-key charm that makes a subtle statement on every commute. Carry it to client meetings in tailored pieces or sling over a sundress at brunch, finishing the look with confident polish and everyday ease.

name: Soulaa
description: Velvety suede meets sharp V-cut seams in a roomy tote that exudes earthy sophistication, while a sculptural gold-tone pyramid tassel sways with quiet confidence as the standout detail, a tactile touch that elevates every office-to-weekend move. Carry it with tailored camel coats to the office, or sling it with a knit set for farmers-market mornings, sealing the look.

name: Anneliese
description: Rich espresso leather wraps the ankle in sleek Chelsea lines, while a lugged block heel gives you confident lift and a grounded, city-ready stride that lasts from morning meetings to after-hours wanderings. Pair with tailored jeans for seminars, or slip into a knit midi for after-hours pub stops.

name: Ibreflex
description: Two-tone lug sole updates the classic leather loafer, adding sporty edge to smooth black uppers and polished gold buckle while hidden cushioning keeps it comfortable. Pair with cropped trousers for work confidence or ground a pleated mini when gallery hops call.

name: Charley
description: Supple black leather reaches knee-high in an equestrian silhouette with a low block heel plus cushioned inset keeping strides steady through urban shortcuts from morning train rush to late gallery visits. Pair with a tailored coat for crisp commutes or slip over ribbed knits when weekend markets beckon.

name: Seralina
description: Wild cow-print fabric sharpens the slingback with a razor-thin stiletto, while cut-away sides keep the silhouette sleek and bold, and soft cushioning makes every step comfortable. Pair with cropped cargos for downtown gallery hops, or slip under a silk suit for invitation-only rooftop soirees call your name tonight.

name: Bestina
description: Polished leather wraps minimalist Chelsea uppers, while chunky lug soles add height and grip for puddled sidewalks and last trains, turning a city dash into a confident stride even on rainy commutes. Pair raw-hem denim for coffee runs, or slip into satin slips at rooftop shows that call for edge and movement.

name: Chicsneaker2
description: Gleaming faux-pearl laces crown the plush corduroy upper of this retro cup-sole sneaker, adding unexpected luxury while hidden cushioning keeps strides light from first lecture dash to late-night ramen run. Pair with cropped trousers for coffee catch-ups or switch into a silky slip dress once rooftop playlists start.

name: Demogorgon
description: That sculpted heel lifts buttery leather into art territory while a swingy red flower charm flirts with each step, turning the classic brown mule into conversation from streetlights to velvet ropes. Pair with cropped denim for gallery openings or slide under slinky dresses when cocktails kick into after-hours dancing.

name: Pineapplepizza
description: Road-trip vibes lace through this leather-and-mesh sneaker, where neutral panels streamline the silhouette and collectible charms swing playfully, creating a standout street-ready look that invites easy, all-day confidence for campus wanderings, cafe hops, and late-night quests. Pair with cuffed chinos for campus coffee breaks, or swap in a satin slip skirt when street-fair sunsets invite spontaneous photos.

name: Therift
description: Smooth leather meets a chunky lug sole for instant edge and traction, with playful red floral charms dangling like secret confetti. Perfect with a printed midi for rooftop sets or ripped denim and a shacket for weekend markets.

name: Helana
description: Supple black leather rises tall and seamless to the knee, framed by a sculpted block heel that offers steady lift, turning sidewalks into runways and elevator rides into statements. Pair with a knit mini for rooftop cocktails, or slip under tailored coats when presentation mornings call for confidence.

name: Hellfirelives
description: Retro trainer lines feel cult-classic, punctuated by Stranger Things charms and bold red lettering along crisp white stripes, all resting on a plush, cushioned sole. Pair with cargo minis for daylight festivals, or swap in joggers for game night marathons that roll into late night coffee runs.

name: Mariettia
description: The Mariettia combat boot combines a sturdy lug sole with elegant tweed material, enhanced by delicate pearl details for a feminine touch. Featuring a side zipper for easy wear, this playful design balances toughness and grace in a uniquely stylish way.

name: Mariettia
description: Sleek synthetic leather meets gold-tone eyelets on chunky lug soles and block heels, giving combat boots swagger across rainy streets. Pair them under cropped denim at galleries or lace up under knit midis as office hours turn into patio hangs.

name: Joma
description: Burgundy patent leather shines on this sleek mid-calf boot featuring rock-steady block heels that deliver confidence from morning brainstorms to midnight struts. Pair it with cropped flares for coffee runs or anchor it under velvet minis during gallery openings leading to rooftop toasts.

name: Marrgo
description: The Marrgo ankle boot in rich burgundy combines a sleek glossy finish with durable lug soles for reliable everyday wear. Designed as a pull-up style, it offers effortless on-and-off convenience while maintaining a polished, expert look suitable for any occasion.

name: Merielle
description: Supple black leather meets gutsy front zips, while a chunky lugged sole lends bold, confident stance from city sidewalks to late-night outings, and a refined silhouette keeps it poised for meetings and street-hungry weekends. Pair with cropped denim for city errands, or ground a sleek midi with a leather jacket for after-hours sips and rooftop moments.

name: Everose
description: Deep burgundy patent leather gathers at a sleek knee-high shaft, crowned by a poised kitten heel that makes every stride feel effortless yet elevated, draping confidence through city streets and after-hours moments. Pair with a sharp ribbed midi and trench for office commutes, or swap in skin-tight denim and a blazer when wine-bar plans surface.

name: Merielle
description: Creamy leather wraps this ankle boot in cool style, with a chunky lug sole block heel boosting traction and confidence, making city puddles and gravel paths feel like smooth invitations. Ground cropped denim for coffee catch-ups, or swap into a knit mini when brainstorms turn to late-night ramen runs.

name: Nolya
description: Buttery suede envelopes a streamlined mid-calf shaft, while a stacked block heel delivers easy elevation and a confident silhouette you can wear from desk to dinner all day. Hidden cushioning and smooth slip-on entry make it as relaxed as your favorite playlist for city strolls and coffee runs.

name: Maellie
description: High-gloss patent leather carves a knee-skimming silhouette with a slender stiletto, while tiny gold buckles wink at the craft and attitude that turn city nights into a subtle runway moment. Pair with tailored trousers for formal evenings, or slide under a satin midi as rooftop cocktails give way to starlit chats.

name: Therift
description: Soft suede ankle boots pair trail-ready lug soles with festival-bright laces, turning urban strolls into bold adventures and giving grounded confidence from pavement to dance floor, with a vibe that won’t quit. Pair with cargo minis for market runs, or slip under a floral midi for rooftop nights.

name: Bellissamo
description: Hidden wedge height reshapes the silhouette in this suede-and-leather high-top, pairing backstage-ready lift with street-smart stacked velcro straps and a calm, confident stride that feels as effortless as it looks. Pair with cropped joggers for fast commutes, or swap in a ribbed mini and bomber when city lights glow.

name: Norelle
description: Midnight-gloss patent leather wraps a sharply pointed toe, and a sculpted block heel rises with confident poise, making every city crosswalk feel like a dramatic spotlight moment under streetlights. Pair with cropped suiting for promotion chats, or slip into a satin mini as rooftop sets hit midnight stride.

name: Coolchic
description: Espresso-deep suede teaming with a sleek leather side flash reimagines the retro jogger, while a pliant gum sole and soft lining turn everyday dashes-from metro stairs to gallery detours-into smooth, silent strides. Pair with cropped trousers for brainstorm brunches, or swap in athleisure leggings when road-trip pit stops call for stretch and speed.

name: Philippa
description: Supple black leather rises knee-high in a clean riding silhouette, with a harness-style buckle strap and a low block heel that lend subtle edge and all-day steadiness for city strolls, commutes, and evenings out. Pair with slim jeans for coffee-to-commute, or slip into a knit midi as museum afternoons melt into rooftop cocktails.

name: Elyne
description: Lustrous burgundy leather shapes this knee-high boot, with a pointy toe and slim stiletto heel adding drama to daily commutes and gallery visits. Layer over slim denim for cafe meet-ups, or pair with a ribbed midi dress for rooftop stories.

name: Haverly
description: Cocoa leather drapes into a graceful slouch around the calf, pairing with a soft lining and a sculpted stacked block heel that brings steady comfort to brisk commutes and cafe check-ins. Pair with skinny denim for gallery afternoons, or ground a cozy sweaterdress for late-night ramen runs.

name: Chicsneaker2
description: Deep merlot pony hair wraps this retro cup-sole sneaker, pairing soft blush stripes with rope-style laces for quiet varsity vibes, while cloud-soft cushioning keeps every city detour scenic and ready for spontaneous adventures. Pair with cuffed denim for weekend coffees, or ground a satin slip beneath stage lights as the night comes alive.

name: Kaydienh
description: Chocolate leather wraps a knee-high, equestrian-inspired shaft, while a steady low heel gives you confident lift through cool mornings and city strolls alike, for days that demand polish and everyday wanderlust. Pair with knit midis for presentation mornings, or wear over jeans on road trips, or swap in a flowing dress for after-hours dinners.

name: Kimmia
description: Chocolate suede drapes into slouchy chic from knee to toe, bringing a lean stiletto that sharpens the line with city-ready confidence and a touch of edge, perfect for glow-lit streets and late-night ambitions. Pair with denim minis for brunch, or swap to leggings for jazz bars or city-date nights.

name: Elyne
description: Supple burnished leathers climb knee-high profiles, sculpting a confident column that elevates every step with a sleek stiletto, turning sidewalks and runways into a personal catwalk for daytime polish and after-hours edge. Pair with a sweater dress for daytime polish, or ground with cropped denim for rooftop cocktails.

name: Elyne
description: Buttery blacks sweep to knee-high endings, with sharply pointed toes that balance sleek stilettos and elongate the silhouette with a city-chic confidence from morning meetings to late-night lounges. Pair with skinnies for caffeinated commutes, or swap in a sleek dress for cocktail-hour city nights.

name: Tinsletta
description: Crimson patent leather catches the light as oversized bows crown the vamp, turning stilettos into show-stoppers with a fearless, runway-ready stride that promises nights full of spotlight-worthy moments. Pair with tuxedo minis for cocktails, or slip beneath sari-inspired gowns as the evening shifts from whispers to applause.

name: Maellie-wc
description: Make a striking impression with these daring knee-high boots in vibrant red. Featuring a sharp stiletto heel and pointed toe, they combine bold design with sleek zipper closure for ease. The buckle ornament adds an edgy flair, perfect for those ready to stand out with confidence and style.

name: Norelle
description: Wild spotted faux-hair finish elevates this ankle boot, while a walkable block heel and smooth back zip partner for confident strides through chilly days, delivering urban edge with a soft, plush underfoot feel. Pair with straight-leg denim for coffee catch-ups, or swap in a slip dress and leather jacket when gigs call for fearless edge.

name: Evander
description: Supple leather wraps the ankle in clean lines, a sharp stiletto lifts the look, and a concealed back zip keeps it sleek from every angle, morning commute to midnight cab ride. Pair with cropped suiting for boardroom wins, or swap in with a slip dress when gallery openings turn into rooftop cocktails.

name: Roll4yourlife
description: Sleek black leather keeps this loafer crisp, and a penny strap tipped with discreet red stitching adds character, while a lightweight cupsole cushions your strides from boardroom entrances to sidewalk detours. Pair it with tapered navy trousers for client lunches or roll with cuffed denim at weekend gigs-the polished upper never flinches.

name: Zethan
description: High-gloss patent leather meets textured mesh in a deep burgundy low-top, making everyday strolls a statement, while the sleek rubber cupsole cushions and grips so city laps stay light. Anchor black jeans for gallery openings or pair with tailored joggers on flight days—the tonal build travels light.

name: Brando
description: Espresso suede envelopes this ankle boot with understated elegance, while a slim leather outsole adds a feather-light touch, making each step on the pavement purposeful. Pair with grey wool trousers for business lunches or team with dark denim for relaxed evenings-the sleek design keeps the focus where you want it.

name: Hawkinshigh
description: Rally the troops! These Stranger Things x ALDO varsity sneakers, with retro terry cloth patch, tiger print sock, and removable Hawkins tag, have just the right aura of preppy cool. When it comes to style, you're top of the class.

name: Zeddyy
description: Warm brown suede defines a Chelsea silhouette that glides through your day with ease, elastic entry panels and back pulls making it quick to slip on, while a rubber outsole keeps every step confident. Team it with charcoal tailoring for meetings or dark denim for nights out, and let the finish whisper polish without effort.

name: Lionel
description: Hand-cut tassel saddle arcs across sleek black leather, giving this loafer movement and a quiet confidence, while a low-profile cup sole keeps you comfortable from early meetings to late-night strolls. Team it with charcoal suiting for pitches, or wear it beneath cuffed chinos for rooftop drinks.

name: Davie
description: Cabin-ready silhouette defines these chukkas, with the moc stitching adding craft, while a lug sole grips confidently on sidewalks and gravel trails, rain or shine all day. Pair them with denim for a market visit, or roll with wool cargos for office days around town.

name: Hellfireclub
description: Pledge your allegiance to the Hellfire Club in these limited-edition Stranger Things x ALDO black leather runners. The removable hang tag and Hellfire print sock bring a hotter than hellfire, rebellious energy to every step.

name: Thevoid
description: White leather meets airflow-driven side panels, giving this silhouette a breathable feel while a gum cupsole cushions every step, grounding the look with casual confidence and a touch of urban edge. Team it with cuffed chinos for game-day hangs, or anchor dark joggers for snack runs, moving effortlessly from the stadium to weekend spots.

name: Arturo
description: Polished buckle hardware defines the loafer, and a cushioned cup sole keeps every stride across meetings to dinners, letting this silhouette carry you from desk to night out on the go with ease. Pair it with tailoring for meetings, or jeans with a polo for after-work drinks.

name: Thevoid
description: Distressed overlays meet checkerboard panels to shape a silhouette that moves with confidence, while a hangtag and laces add a detail and a rubber cupsole keeps every stride light and grounded. Team it with joggers for weekday record hunts or roll with cuffed chinos for weekend backyard hangs.

name: Zeddyy
description: Saddle-brown suede Chelsea boots feature side panels for wear, a profile, and lugged soles that grip streets from commutes to adventures, moving you through doors and across rooms with confidence every day. Pair them with trousers for meetings, and with denim for strolls across town.

name: Braz
description: Glossy cognac leather defines this minimalist Oxford, where a supple leather sole ensures every step feels fluid, transforming daily meetings into effortless strolls with understated elegance. Anchor it with navy suits for major presentations or balance denim on gallery nights-the almond toe keeps your look impeccably sharp.

name: Draco
description: Mahogany leather pairs with a comfortable padded collar in this combat boot, and a lug sole grips city sidewalks, keeping your steps confident from workday commutes to late-night gigs. Anchor it with denim for laid-back backyard gatherings, or pair with chinos for those creative presentations-the mahogany finish blends rugged and refined effortlessly.

name: Esttanqueiro
description: Stormy grey matte upper and metal eyelets climb to the ankle in this streamlined high-top, its cushy rubber cup sole absorbing daily pavement shock while tonal stitching keeps the look stealth. Anchor black joggers for weekend errands or pair cuffed chinos for casual drinks—its clean palette plays nicely wherever plans wander.

name: Armie
description: Smooth leather meets suede at the heel, a tactile contrast, while the two-tone lugged outsole provides trail-grade grip on sidewalks without extra weight. Pair with flannel overshirts and dark denim for weekend markets, or cuff wool trousers for casual office Fridays—the contrast stitching adds polish.

name: Ccourtline
description: All-over embossing on the side panels gives this cupsole sneaker quiet flair that sneaks into every look, while lightweight synthetic uppers and a cushioned sole keep city miles easy. Style it with joggers for airport dashes or cuffed chinos for meetups—muted tones adapt to anywhere the day takes you.

name: Darion
description: Polished brown leather wraps this ankle boot, blending a cap-toe with rugged lug-sole grip for a grounded, all-day stride that looks as ready as you feel. Team it with trousers for the office or roll denim for weekend dinners, letting the finish do the talking through every step.

name: Justin
description: Glass beads mix-and-match sizes circle the wrist in a black-sheen glow punctuated by gilded cubes and a pave sphere, delivering a ready-made trio that never feels fussy. Layer them with a denim jacket and slip dress for cocktails, or stack beside a chunky knit for weekend coffee runs.

name: Lionel
description: Espresso-brown polished leather gives this loafer depth, while twin tassels over the moc apron add movement to keep boardroom polish relaxed on the walk home. Anchor navy suiting for promotion pitches, or roll with cuffed chinos for dinners—the sleek profile handles every moment with quiet grace.

name: Armie
description: City-ready grey leather and suede panels meet rugged trail-bred lug treads in this combat boot, while a plush faux-fur lining keeps the warmth locked in and metallic eyelets ensure smooth lacing. Pair them with cuffed denim for weekend markets or with cargo joggers and a flannel jacket for cozy nights by the firepit.

name: Farrell
description: Brown leather features topside lacing and metal grommets reminiscent of classic deck shoes, while a suede collar and a lugged rubber outsole guarantee comfort in every step. Pair with cuffed selvedge denim for weekend market strolls or team with wool trousers on casual Fridays-the boat-lace detail straddles the line between relaxed and refined.

name: Konnor
description: Two-tone leather and textile upper bring casual polish, with warm brown overlays and a charcoal panel creating contrast, while a chunky cup sole ensures confidence. Wear it with charcoal denim for coffee runs or tailored chinos for meetings, letting the finish speak.

name: Amur
description: Midnight suede adorned with tonal micro-studs adds a touch of subtle sparkle to this almond-toe boot, while the rubber block heel makes it perfect for those long city strolls. Pair it with black skinny jeans for rooftop events or elevate a satin suit at winter galas-the sparkle truly sets the tone.

name: Samuel
description: Midnight velvet shapes this loafer, a clean silhouette with a buckle that brings polish to every stride, ready to move from meetings to after-hours mingling. Pair it with a suit for client dinners, or roll with denim and a blazer for evenings, then let the finish do the talking at after-parties.

name: Amur
description: Rich burgundy leather infuses this ankle boot with an air of confidence, and a hidden side zip slides you in smoothly, while a low block heel ensures city-friendly movement from morning meetings to late-night adventures. Pair it with slim black denim for art show evenings or match it with charcoal suits at winter weddings-the sleek almond toe remains polished.

name: Melville
description: Suede shapes this loafer with a penny strap and heritage-inspired stitching, while interior padding keeps steps steady for hours on the go. Team it with chinos for meetings, or pair with denim for dinners, commutes, and errands.

name: Blyth
description: Deep-cut lug soles grip wet streets, while leather uppers keep the silhouette timeless, and metal eyelets with tonal stitching add a polished flair suited for any forecast. Team with cuffed denim for rooftop gigs, or pair with tapered wool trousers for Monday meetings, anchoring your look from dawn to dusk.

name: Blyth
description: Earthy brown leather and metal eyelets frame this lace-up boot, and its deep-tread lug sole handles both sidewalks and trails, making it perfect for any weather. Pair with cuffed selvedge denim for Saturday markets or a wool overcoat and chinos for weekday commutes-traction keeps you steady.

name: Darion
description: Black leather cap-toe combat boot with a durable lug sole anchors edge without shouting, while a padded collar cushions the ankle and metal eyelets offer dependable lacing—every stride feels ready for the day. Team it with denim for weekday runs or anchor a tailored suit for downtown nights—its finish does the talking.

name: Lynx
description: Angled rugged mesh wraps the black boot, delivering breathable comfort as a reliable outsole grips uneven terrain and every stride, while metal eyelets and hiking laces lock in dependable support. Team cargos for dawn trails or roll dark denim for post-trek patios to anchor your day from hike to hangout.

name: Samuel
description: Emerald velvet drapes this slip-on loafer in quiet luxury, while a matte horsebit lends sculpted shine and a low stacked heel steadies every step with effortless poise for days that flow from desk to after-hours. Pair with tailored trousers for a gala-ready moment, or cuffed denim and a lightweight blazer for a versatile city evening.

name: Konnor
description: Black leather combines with a lightweight textile panel for a sleek urban look that moves with you, while a cup sole offers everyday comfort. Pair it with charcoal chinos for meetings, or go with dark denim and a bomber for laid-back weekend errands.

name: Gordo
description: Retro-runner suede panelling teams with crisp white nylon, while a grippy gum ripple outsole locks traction in place and an airy foam midsole lightens every stride from sunrise walks to late-night runs. Pair it with tapered joggers for weekend brunch or anchor cuffed chinos on casual Fridays-the retro lines handle both effortlessly.

name: Zethan
description: Ripple-textured leather pairs with suede accents to define a look, a cushioned sole absorbs shocks for errands and outings, delivering comfort that carries you through the day. Pair it with joggers for gigs, or roll with trousers for Fridays at the office, and carry it into evenings and weekends.

name: Gordo
description: Midnight-blue suede pairs with smooth leather panels on this jogger, catching light across contrast textures as a cushioned rubber sole keeps daily miles easy and the silhouette ready for coffee runs or longer city strolls. Team it with cuffed chinos for patio brunches, or roll with jogger pants on red-eye flights.

name: Torroo
description: Cognac suede shapes this streamlined chukka, with silhouettes and tonally stitched unlined interiors that keep weights light while rubber-cup soles cushion each stride. Pair them with charcoal wool pants for client gatherings or roll with darker denim for casual Fridays, and the burnished finish does the talking.

name: Melville
description: Cognac leather shapes a streamlined loafer on a lug sole, adding edge without losing polish, so you move through office days and city nights with confidence. Pair it with chinos for boardroom moments, or with denim and a blazer for dinner dates, anchoring workdays to evenings.

name: Visco
description: Midnight-smooth leather meets a subtly grained heel panel cinched by a strap and buckle, delivering rider energy with a silhouette and a heel that keeps movement easy through commutes and evenings. Pair it with denim for gallery openings or anchor it under a suit for winter weddings.

name: Farrell
description: Moc-stitched toes and 360 rawhide lacing give these ankle boots a rugged, handcrafted presence, while cushioned collars keep every step comfortable on long days, from morning markets to dusk hikes. Roll with cargos for Saturday market strolls, or pair with denim for bonfire nights—the lugs are ready for any terrain.

name: Clubcrew
description: Ribbed cotton crew socks in beige, grey, and rust wrap feet in soft daily comfort, made for long days from campus coffee runs to late-night study sessions. Let them peek above loafers or sneakers with pleated minis for campus sprints, and cinch weekend denim or bike shorts for brunch runs.

name: Samuel
description: High-shine patent leather meets a bite of metal hardware, giving this loafer a glow that stands out, while a low stacked heel and smooth leather lining keep every stride easy from day-to-night. Pair it with charcoal tailoring for gala nights or slip it beneath indigo denim for rooftop dates—two looks, one polished finish.
